title: Documentation & Assets Inventory System

project_context.description: MCP server providing comprehensive documentation, changelog, planning, and project inventory tools

phase_objectives: Implement documentation_inventory tool (Tool #20) for documentation coverage analysis
Implement assets_inventory tool (Tool #21) for static asset optimization analysis
Complete v2.0.0 major release with 21 MCP tools
new_patterns_introduced: Asset dimension and MIME type detection
critical_success_factors: Both tools perform within performance targets
Quality and optimization scores are meaningful and actionable
Coverage and optimization metrics are accurate
Testing on docs-mcp shows realistic results
handoff_notes: Phase 5 builds on successful patterns from Phases 1-4. Focus on implementing two new generators with custom scoring algorithms. Both tools follow established MCP patterns (validation at boundaries, error handling, structured logging, TypedDict coverage). Key challenge is implementing meaningful quality/optimization scoring that provides actionable insights. Phase 5 completion enables Phase 6 (Unified Reporting) for cross-category analysis and dashboards.
